entry.title: WIND WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 10:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SSE 54 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
